data.name: They Bleed Pixels Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Over 2 hours of original music composed by Shaun Hatton (aka DJ Finish Him) for the game They Bleed Pixels by Spooky Squid Games. 54 tracks including out takes, variants and remixes not found in the game.
  • METAMORPHOSIS - 00:15

  • YABACHIBAHN - 01:44

  • UNLEASH - 01:00

  • SCOURGE - 03:41

  • WROUGHT -01:58
